Package edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.service

Class HogwartsPersonService<M extends HogwartsPerson,D extends HogwartsPersonDTO>

java.lang.Object
edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.service.HogwartsPersonService<M,D>
Type Parameters:
M - The type of HogwartsPerson (Student | Teacher).
D - The DTO for the HogwartsPerson (StudentDTO | TeacherDTO).
Direct Known Subclasses:
StudentService, TeacherService
public abstract class HogwartsPersonService<M extends HogwartsPerson,D extends HogwartsPersonDTO> extends Object
This class provides service methods to manage HogwartsPerson entities in the school.

  • Constructor Details

    • HogwartsPersonService

      public HogwartsPersonService(HogwartsPersonRepository<M> repository, HouseService houseService)
      Constructor for HogwartsPersonService. Uses dependency injection to get the repository and HouseService.
      Parameters:
      repository - The repository for HogwartsPerson entities.
      houseService - The service for House entities.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public abstract List<D> getAll()
      Must be implemented by the subclasses to get a list of all HogwartsPerson entities of the given type.
      Returns:
      A list of all HogwartsPerson entities of the given type.

    • get

      public abstract D get(Long id)
      Must be implemented by the subclasses to get a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to find.
      Returns:
      The HogwartsPerson entity, or null if it does not exist.

    • getEntity

      public M getEntity(Long id)
      Gets a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID. Needed for the CourseService to get the teacher/student entities to add to a course.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to find.
      Returns:
      The HogwartsPerson entity, or null if it does not exist.

    • create

      public abstract D create(D personDTO)
      Must be implemented by the subclasses to add a new HogwartsPerson entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      personDTO - The DTO for the new HogwartsPerson entity.
      Returns:
      The new HogwartsPerson entity.

    • update

      public abstract D update(D person, Long id)
      Must be implemented by the subclasses to update a HogwartsPerson entity in the database. Must overwrite the entity with all the new values from the DTO.
      Parameters:
      person - The updated HogwartsPerson entity.
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to update.
      Returns:
      The updated HogwartsPerson entity.

    • patch

      public abstract D patch(D person, Long id)
      Must be implemented by the subclasses to update a HogwartsPerson entity in the database. Must overwrite only the fields that are not null in the DTO.
      Parameters:
      person - The updated HogwartsPerson entity.
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to update.
      Returns:
      The updated HogwartsPerson entity.

    • delete

      public void delete(Long id)
      Deletes a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to delete.
